features: System securitySupports three-level account, password, user multi-level authority management
onlinevisitor: Support 10 visitors at the same time
video: Compression formatH.264 main profile level 3,dual stream
inputoutput: two-way audio,one channel linear(microphone with power supply) input /linear output
ddnsfree: Built in free DDNS system,for example http://demo.easyn.hk,'demo' is serial code
system: System requirementMicrosoft Win98 SE/ME/2000/XP,Vista IE5.0, NET4.5,firefox,chrome
alarmaction: Support Email photo , FTP photo , FTP record ,photo and record can be written into SD card
alarm: Motion detection regionssupport 4 Motion detection regions
ipmode: Dynamic IP address, static IP address, PPPOE
localmemory: Support up to 32G TF card memory( SD card is not included)
